resources.string:
The first user who click is 
 Player 1 and the second is Player 2. 

 Player 1 = X mark 
 Player 2 = 0 mark 

 The goal of both players : 
 3 straight line (Vertical,Horizontal, 
 Diagonal Left/Right). 

 The one who made 3 straight line will 
 be the winner. 

 When all boxes are filled and still 
 no winner, the game will be draw. 
 
 The reset button will reset the game.
